dcterms:description: A parallel corpus for Bengali-English machine translation, containing 2.75 million parallel pairs from various domains such as Wikipedia, news articles, and legal documents.

dcterms:description: A multilingual evaluation benchmark for low-resource and multilingual machine translation, designed to assess translation quality across 101 languages.
dcterms:title: FLoRes

dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset for multilingual abstractive summarization, covering 44 languages with articles and summaries written by professional editors.

dcterms:description: A benchmark dataset for information-seeking question answering in diverse languages, including unanswerable questions to increase task difficulty.

dcterms:description: A manually labeled multi-turn dialogue dataset that reflects real-life conversations in various social situations, rich in emotion.

dcterms:description: A dataset for cross-lingual abstractive text summarization, curated by aligning identical articles written in different languages.
